mapper.select: SELECT si.id, si.sku_default_img AS default_img, si.sku_name AS title, si.price, 0 AS hot_score, bt.id AS tm_id, bt.tm_name, bt.logo_url AS tm_logo_url, b1.id AS category1_id, b1.`NAME` AS category1_name, b2.id AS category2_id, b2.`NAME` AS category2_name, b3.id AS category3_id, b3.`name` AS category3_name FROM sku_info si, sku_attr_value sav, base_attr_info bai, base_attr_value bav, base_trademark bt, base_category1 b1, base_category2 b2, base_category3 b3 WHERE si.id = sav.sku_id AND sav.attr_id = bai.id AND bai.id = bav.attr_id AND si.tm_id = bt.id AND b3.id = si.category3_id AND si.id = #{skuId}
